bugmacro.disable_number-s: Disable executing macro with number keypresses
bugmacro.disable_number-l: Exactly as it says on the tin, never proc your macros by updating your potion count again.
bugmacro.disable_wasd-s: Disable moving tokens with WASD keys
bugmacro.disable_wasd-l: Exactly as it says on the tin, never move your tokens around by typing again.
